#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
#define SIZE 10001
 
using namespace std;
 
int boxes[SIZE];
 
//finding max occured number and its count
void printMaxAndCount(){
int max = boxes[1];
int index = 1;
 
for(int i=1;i<SIZE;i++)
	if(boxes[i] > max){
		max = boxes[i];
		index = i;
	}
 
cout << index<< " "<< boxes[index]  << endl;
			
}
 
//for resetting the box values
void reset(){
for(int i=0;i<SIZE;i++)
	boxes[i] = 0;
}
 
 
int main(){
reset();
 
int tc;
cin >> tc;
 
int len;
int dummy;
 
for(int i=0;i<tc;i++){
	cin >> len;
	for(int j=0;j<len;j++){
		cin >> dummy;
		boxes[dummy]++;
	}
	printMaxAndCount();
 
reset();
}
 
return 0;
}
